member.name: M:Presentation.Controllers.PermissionsController.GetPermission(System.Guid,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Gets the permission with the specified identifier, if it exists.
member.returns: The permission with the specified identifier, if it exists.

member.name: M:Presentation.Controllers.PermissionsController.CreatePermission(Application.Permissions.Commands.CreatePermission.CreatePermissionRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Creates a new permission based on the specified request.
member.returns: The identifier of the newly created permission.
